Robert Sayre wrote:

>>
>>  The claims of JSON's superiority seem mostly based on confusing XML with
>>  DOM on the one hand, while refusing to learn what XML actually is.
>>  Developers like to be able to just shove JSON into JavaScript and not
>>  leanr anything new. Of course, evaling JSON as JavaScript doesn't
>>  actually work, but most developers haven't noticed that yet.
> 
> I don't think these claims can be seriously answered unless some
> concrete examples are given.
>
